active_learning.peer_teaching: In pairs, take turns explaining the key management lifecycle (generate, distribute, store, rotate, revoke) using a mock email scenario (e.g., CEO sending confidential report). Follow with a teach-back quiz where the listener asks clarifying questions and rates understanding on a 1-5 scale.
active_learning.problem_solving: Scenario: Your company's CEO's private key is compromised during an email phishing attack. Outline step-by-step revocation, stakeholder notification, key rotation, and recovery procedures while minimizing business disruption. Simulate with GPG tools if possible, and role-play defenses using SPF/DKIM/DMARC.
